price: ता, सीन। ये क़ुरआन तथा स्पष्ट पुस्तक की आयतें हैं।
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
